home.title: Welcome to the VERT Stack Template
home.description: This template provides a solid foundation for building modern web applications using:
home.metaDescription: VERT Stack Template: A powerful foundation for modern web apps using Vite, ESLint, React, and TypeScript. Build fast, efficient, and scalable applications.

home.exploreMessage: Explore the different pages to see examples of routing, component structure, and API integration.

about.description: This is the about page of our VERT stack application.

contact.title: Contact

contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with the VERT Stack Template team. We're here to answer your questions and help you build amazing web applications.

apiExample.title: API Integration Example
apiExample.description: This page demonstrates how to integrate an external API using the VERT stack. It showcases fetching data, handling loading and error states, and displaying the results.
apiExample.metaDescription: Explore our API integration example using the VERT Stack. Learn how to fetch and display data efficiently in your React applications.

userList.title: User Directory
userList.description: This component demonstrates how to fetch and display data from an external API using the VERT stack, with internationalization support for formatting addresses, numbers, and lists.
